node.title: What We Do
node.excerpt:
DSNP.org is an independent non-profit organization, focused on stewardship of
the Decentralized Social Networking Protocol [https://www.dsnp.org/hello-world/] 
(DSNP). The organization fits within the umbrella of Project Liberty
[https://www.projectliberty.io/] as the provider of one core component (the
social graph protocol) that connects the many different technologies that make
up a decentralized social network. Both DSNP.org and Project Liberty have been
launched out of Unfinished Labs [http
node.plaintext:
DSNP.org is an independent non-profit organization, focused on stewardship of
the Decentralized Social Networking Protocol [https://www.dsnp.org/hello-world/] 
(DSNP). The organization fits within the umbrella of Project Liberty
[https://www.projectliberty.io/] as the provider of one core component (the
social graph protocol) that connects the many different technologies that make
up a decentralized social network. Both DSNP.org and Project Liberty have been
launched out of Unfinished Labs [https://www.unfinishedlabs.io/] as part of
their efforts to build public infrastructure for the web that puts citizens at
the center of an innovative, inclusive web economy.
node.html: DSNP.org is an independent non-profit organization, focused on stewardship of the Decentralized Social Networking Protocol (DSNP). The organization fits within the umbrella of Project Liberty as the provider of one core component (the social graph protocol) that connects the many different technologies that make up a decentralized social network. Both DSNP.org and Project Liberty have been launched out of Unfinished Labs as part of their efforts to build public infrastructure for the web that puts citizens at the center of an innovative, inclusive web economy.

node.title: Forums
node.plaintext:
All questions and suggestions are welcome! If you’re curious about something or
just wondering where the most appropriate place to start is, please post and
we’ll do our best to help.
node.html: All questions and suggestions are welcome! If you’re curious about something or just wondering where the most appropriate place to start is, please post and we’ll do our best to help.

node.title: DSNP
node.plaintext:
Here you can find detailed documentation regarding the current state of the
Decentralized Social Networking Protocol, previous iterations and proposals for
future extensions.
node.html: Here you can find detailed documentation regarding the current state of the Decentralized Social Networking Protocol, previous iterations and proposals for future extensions.

node.title: Testnet
node.plaintext:
The DSNP is backed by a blockchain network that helps applications find
messages.  This is our testnet version of that blockchain.
node.html: The DSNP is backed by a blockchain network that helps applications find messages.  This is our testnet version of that blockchain.

node.title: SDK
node.plaintext:
The Software Development Kit offers the core features, communication
facilitations, build configurations, and common components for DSNP-enabled
applications.
node.html: The Software Development Kit offers the core features, communication facilitations, build configurations, and common components for DSNP-enabled applications.

node.title: Example Client
node.plaintext:
Using the DSNP SDK, the Example Client demonstrates how to quickly integrate
with the DSNP and manage all three elements.
node.html: Using the DSNP SDK, the Example Client demonstrates how to quickly integrate with the DSNP and manage all three elements.

node.html: DSNP.org is an independent non-profit organization, focused on the Decentralized Social Network Protocol (DSNP). The organization fits within the umbrella of Project Liberty as the provider of one core component (the social graph protocol) that connects the many different technologies that make up a decentralized social network. Both DSNP.org and Project Liberty have been launched out of Unfinished Labs as part of their efforts to build public infrastructure for the web that puts citizens at the center of an innovative, inclusive web economy.
